title: The Controversial Conference Championships | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 388)
description:
The Rams edged out the Saints with the help of a questionable referee decision, and Tom Brady took down the Chiefs on his way to a ninth Super Bowl.
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
